name: Hidden Light
description:
Proceed through the dungeon by carefully managing your light resource to guide your way!

Instructions

  • Launch by clicking the GameJamLight executable.
  • On the launch screen, select the appropriate Quality.
  • Press the Launch game button.
  • Enjoy the game!

Controls

  • Hold shift to run.
  • Press right mouse click to shoot light orbs.
  • Press F key for special power.
  • Hit ESC key to go to to the Main Menu to quit or if you're stuck.

Tips

  • Watch your light resource bar!
  • If seriously stuck. Press the F for a little help.
  • Doors will require a certain amount of light resource.
